docs.title: Welcome to Ciclobeef Studio
docs.text: Ciclobeef Studio is an international art initiative dedicated to creating and curating high-end artworks inspired by history, politics and society. We combine research-based storytelling with premium visual presentation, aiming to deliver pieces that are both aesthetically powerful and intellectually meaningful.

docs.title: Who We Are
docs.text: Ciclobeef Studio operates at the intersection of art, historical research and social commentary. Our work is designed for collectors, institutions, galleries and projects that require more than decorative visuals: they seek narrative depth and long-term cultural value.

docs.title: What We Do
docs.text:
• Curate and design art pieces with historical, political and social themes.
  • Develop visual narratives that connect past and present contexts.
  • Prepare artworks and documentation suitable for international clients and institutions.
  • Build a digital presence ready to integrate with modern platforms and automation tools (such as Meta Graph API).

docs.title: Our Values
docs.text:
• Historical depth – every piece is grounded in context and research.
  • Visual excellence – high-end production and presentation quality.
  • Ethical commitment – respect for cultural memory and social impact.
  • Global mindset – artworks and services designed for international audiences.

docs.title: Why Choose Ciclobeef Studio?
docs.text:
• We treat each piece as a curated narrative, not just an image.
  • We aim to serve collectors, institutions and cultural projects with professional-grade documentation and communication.
  • Our roadmap includes advanced automation and API integrations to provide timely, data-driven interactions and services.

docs.title: Our Artistic Promise
docs.text: We commit to producing artworks that invite reflection, preserve memory and connect viewers with historical and social processes in a respectful, sophisticated and accessible way.

docs.title: Contact Us
docs.text:
For collaborations, commissions or institutional inquiries:

Contact us{ .btn-primary }

docs.title: Privacy Policy
docs.text:
Ciclobeef Studio respects the privacy of its clients, collaborators and visitors.

This page explains, in simple terms, what data may be collected through our digital channels, how it may be used and which rights you have regarding your information.

docs.title: What Data We Collect
docs.text:
Depending on the form or contact channel, we may collect:

  • Name and surname
  • Email address
  • Country or region
  • Message content or project description

We do not intentionally collect sensitive personal data (such as health, political affiliation or financial details) through our public website.

docs.title: How We Use Your Data
docs.text:
We may use the information you provide to:

  • Respond to your inquiries or collaboration proposals.
  • Prepare quotes or project scopes.
  • Maintain a basic record of potential or current clients.

We do not sell your data to third parties.

docs.title: Data Storage and Security
docs.text:
• Data may be stored in email systems, project documents or other internal tools used by Ciclobeef Studio.
  • We take reasonable measures to protect our systems; however, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

docs.title: Your Rights
docs.text:
You may request:

  • Access to the personal data we hold about you.
  • Correction of inaccurate or outdated information.
  • Deletion of your data from our records, unless we are legally required to keep it.

To do so, please email us at:

ciclobeefstudio@gmail.com (or the final email you configure for the project)

docs.title: Updates to This Policy
docs.text:
This policy may be updated as the project evolves or as legal requirements change. Any significant update will be reflected in this page with a new revision date.

Last updated for web version v0.3.0.

docs.title: Mission
docs.text: To connect people worldwide with history and society through premium artistic creations that combine visual excellence, research and critical reflection.

docs.title: Vision
docs.text: To build a catalog of artworks and visual narratives that can be exhibited, collected and integrated into projects led by museums, institutions, foundations and private collectors around the world.

docs.title: Objectives
docs.text:
• Offer high-quality, curated art pieces with strong historical and social content.
  • Provide a professional and reliable experience to international clients.
  • Document our work transparently and with academic rigor.
  • Prepare the technical foundation to integrate automation tools (e.g. Meta Graph API) into our communication and services.

docs.title: Scope
docs.text:
Ciclobeef Studio operates with an international focus:

  • Geographical scope: North America, Europe, Latin America and other regions open to premium framed art and curated visual projects.
  • Client segments: collectors, galleries, institutions, cultural projects and curated spaces with high visual standards.
  • Medium: framed artworks, digital previews and documentation prepared for online and offline presentation.

docs.title: Future Technical Integration
docs.text:
As part of our roadmap, Ciclobeef Studio will incorporate technical layers to:

  • Automate communication and content distribution through Meta platforms.
  • Provide APIs or endpoints to integrate with other systems (backends, dashboards, CRMs).
  • Enable data-driven insights about audience response and campaign performance.

This document serves as a reference point for aligning the artistic vision with the technical roadmap.

docs.title: 1. Identidad Visual
docs.text: Nombre de marca: CicloBeef Studio Tagline: Arte de alta gama, historia y sociedad Misión: Democratizar el acceso al arte histórico con piezas que conecten visualmente pasado y presente. Visión: Convertirse en la referencia global de arte impreso de inspiración histórica con enfoque social. Valores: - Elegancia - Investigación rigurosa - Impacto cultural - Exclusividad

docs.title: 2. Paleta de Colores
docs.text: Uso Color HEX Primario Negro profundo #1A1A1A Secundario Bronce clásico #BFA56D Fondo claro Blanco puro #FFFFFF Acento Rojo oscuro #8B0000 Neutros Gris claro #F5F5F5, #777777

docs.title: 3. Tipografía
docs.text:
• Titulares: Playfair Display, serif Tamaño base: 2.5rem, Peso: 700
  • Texto general: Inter, sans-serif Tamaño base: 1rem, Peso: 400
  • Citas o destacados: Itálica, color #8B0000

docs.title: 4. Botones y Enlaces
docs.text:
.btn-primary - Fondo: #BFA56D, Texto: #FFFFFF - Padding: 12px 24px - Radio: 4px - Hover: fondo #8B0000

Enlaces - Color por defecto: #BFA56D - Hover: #8B0000 - Sin subrayado

docs.title: 5. Layout General
docs.text: Header: - Fondo: #1A1A1A, Logo en blanco Footer: - Fondo: #1A1A1A, Texto: #F5F5F5 Contenedor: - .container { max-width: 1100px; padding: 1rem; }

docs.title: 6. Estilo de Imágenes
docs.text:
• Formato: WebP o PNG
  • Ancho máximo: 1200px en desktop
  • Estilo visual: alta resolución, iluminación contrastada, tonos sobrios
  • Márgenes: 80px vertical en desktop, 40px en móvil

docs.title: 7. Espaciado
docs.text:
• Línea base: 1.6
  • h1: margen superior 60px desktop / 40px móvil
  • Párrafos: márgenes 24px arriba y abajo

docs.title: 8. Versionado del Proyecto
docs.text:
• v0.1.0: Estructura base
  • v0.2.0: Landing institucional
  • v0.3.0: Branding corporativo + documentación
  • v0.4.0: Backend FastAPI
  • v0.5.0: Frontend dinámico React

docs.title: 9. Flujo de Trabajo GitFlow
docs.text:
• main: producción estable
  • develop: integración de features
  • feature/design-v3: rama de branding actual
  • release/0.3.0: rama de estabilización antes del despliegue
  • Tags: v0.3.0 (desencadena despliegue)

docs.title: Our Team
docs.text: Ciclobeef Studio brings together professionals in art, design, research and technology. Our combined experience allows us to approach each piece as both an artistic and an intellectual project.

docs.title: Core Team (Representative Roles)
docs.text:
Art Direction & Curation Leads the artistic concept, visual coherence and narrative direction of each piece.

Historical & Social Research Ensures that every work is grounded in reliable sources, contextual analysis and ethical considerations.

Visual Design & Production Transforms concepts and research into finished visual pieces ready for high-end printing and framing.

Technology & Automation Designs and maintains the technical foundation for digital presence, documentation, APIs and future automation with Meta Graph API and other platforms.

docs.title: How We Work
docs.text:
• We treat each project as a collaboration between art, research and technology.
  • We document our process and decisions to maintain transparency and reproducibility.
  • We design with international standards in mind, aiming for long-term relevance and institutional compatibility.
